title: Jekyll & Hyde  -rare-
description:
---Rare Torrents---



Jekyll & Hyde


Developer: In Utero
Publisher: Cryo Interactive
Release date: 2001
Genre: Adventure / 3rd-person
Language/Audio: English


Set in 1890 London, this game puts the player in the role of Dr. Jekyll, whose mission is to save his daughter, Laurie. Dr. Jekyll has no choice but to reactivate his laboratory equipment and bring back his dreaded alter ego, Mr. Hyde.



Tested and working on Windows 8.1 64-bit
